mapper.select: select b.rule_id, b.rule_name, b.rule_ip, b.description from blacklist b
select b.rule_id, b.rule_name, b.rule_ip, b.description from blacklist b where b.rule_id = #{ruleId}
select b.rule_id, b.rule_name, b.rule_ip, b.description from blacklist b where b.rule_name = #{ruleName}
mapper.insert: insert INTO blacklist (rule_id,rule_name, rule_ip, description) values (#{ruleId},#{ruleName},#{ruleIp},#{description});
